thread.title: ‘To be a champion, master the fundamentals’
thread.title_full: ‘To be a champion, master the fundamentals’

author: besguerra
title: ‘To be a champion, master the fundamentals’
text:
Philippine Daily Inquirer / 03:44 AM January 09, 2017 
As talented as he is, NBA champion Kyrie Irving of the Cleveland Cavaliers didn’t just transform into one of the quickest and most explosive basketball players in the world overnight. 
Former Gilas Pilipinas coach Tab Baldwin stressed the importance of mastering the fundamentals the way the NBA star did as he supervised the Kyrie Irving clinic last Saturday at Treston College Gym in Taguig. 
“You can’t really play the game well unless you can play the fundamentals,” said the Ateneo coach during the launch of Irving’s third signature shoes before aspiring basketball players and the media. “When you walk in the gym the first thing you do shouldn’t be to pick up the basketball and shoot it.” ADVERTISEMENT
